org.wlf.filedownloader.base

类 Status

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wlf.filedownloader.base.Status

  • public final class Status
extends Object
    download file status
    文件下载状态
    作者:
    wlf(Andy)

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_COMPLETED
      COMPLETED(the file has been fully downloaded without errors)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_DOWNLOADING
      DOWNLOADING
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_ERROR
      ERROR(the download encountered serious error and may not recovery)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_FILE_NOT_EXIST
      FILE_NOT_EXIST(the file has been started downloading ,but removed or delete unexpected)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_PAUSED
      PAUSED(the download is paused)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_PREPARED
      PREPARED(the url source has been connected)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_PREPARING
      PREPARING(prepare to connect the url source)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_RETRYING
      RETRYING(retry to re-connect the url source after failed)
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_UNKNOWN
      UNKNOWN
      static int DOWNLOAD_STATUS_WAITING
      WAITING(wait for other task finish,there is no more task place to hold this task)
